title: Smexy Phantasies
description: Rachel and Lisa have been inseparable since the second grade. Best friends, they've done everything together, attended the same schools, even worked together. But Rachel has a secret. She's had a crush on her best friend for years. Rachel isn't the only one with a secret though. Lisa makes adult videos at Smexy Studios. When her costar cancels Rachel has to fill in. Can Rachel make it through this one job without letting her true feelings show? When their video goes live both Rachel and Lisa get more than they bargained for. But are they ready for what happens next?
author: Izzy Szyn
